languages.text: "Ну, или можешь отвергнуть мое щедрое предложение и поискать помощи где-то еще. Слышал про ту задыхающуюся людишко, что вечно крутится у врат в Анатомическую оперу и умоляет гемункула ее спасти? Она не может нормально дышать и даже имя свое произносит очень потешно — Дж-хай Х-хейд-хари. Будто вот-вот испустит дух".

"Or you can reject my generous offer and look for help elsewhere. Have you heard about that humanling that's always hanging around the gate to the Anatomical Opera, gasping for breath, and begging the Haemonculus to save her? She can't breathe normally, even the way she says her name is funny — J-Jae H-Heyd-hari, as if she's about to suffocate."
languages.original_text: "Ну, или можешь отвергнуть мое щедрое предложение и поискать помощи где-то еще. Слышал про ту задыхающуюся людишко, что вечно крутится у врат в Анатомическую оперу и умоляет гемункула ее спасти? Она не может нормально дышать и даже имя свое произносит очень потешно — Дж-хай Х-хейд-хари. Будто вот-вот испустит дух".

traits.locale_text: "Or you can reject my generous offer and look for help elsewhere. Have you heard about that humanling that's always hanging around the gate to the Anatomical Opera, gasping for breath, and begging the Haemonculus to save her? She can't breathe normally, even the way she says her name is funny — J-Jae H-Heyd-hari, as if she's about to suffocate."
traits.speaker: Anger

Have you heard about that humanling that's always hanging around the gate to the Anatomical Opera, gasping for breath, and begging the Haemonculus to save her? She can't breathe normally, even the way she says her name is funny — J-Jae H-Heyd-hari, as if she's about to suffocate."

Have you heard about that humanling that's always hanging around the gate to the Anatomical Opera, gasping for breath, and begging the Haemonculus to save her? She can't breathe normally, even the way she says her name is funny — J-Jae H-Heyd-hari, as if she's about to suffocate."
traits.speaker: Anger

traits.locale_text: "Or you can reject my generous offer and look for help elsewhere. Have you heard about that humanling that's always hanging around the gate to the Anatomical Opera, gasping for breath, and begging the Haemonculus to save her? She can't breathe normally, even the way she says her name is funny — J-Jae H-Heyd-hari, as if she's about to suffocate."
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: “或者，你也可以拒绝我的慷慨提议，去别的地方寻求帮助。你听说过另一个小人儿吗？她总是在解剖歌剧院门口徘徊，喘着粗气，乞求血伶人救她一命。她没办法正常呼吸，就连自报姓名的样子也滑稽的不得了——婕、婕伊，海、海达、达利，就好像她马上就要憋死一样。”
languages.original_text: "Or you can reject my generous offer and look for help elsewhere. Have you heard about that humanling that's always hanging around the gate to the Anatomical Opera, gasping for breath, and begging the Haemonculus to save her? She can't breathe normally, even the way she says her name is funny — J-Jae H-Heyd-hari, as if she's about to suffocate."

traits.locale_text: “或者，你也可以拒绝我的慷慨提议，去别的地方寻求帮助。你听说过另一个小人儿吗？她总是在解剖歌剧院门口徘徊，喘着粗气，乞求血伶人救她一命。她没办法正常呼吸，就连自报姓名的样子也滑稽的不得了——婕、婕伊，海、海达、达利，就好像她马上就要憋死一样。”
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: «También puedes rechazar mi generosa oferta y buscar ayuda en otra parte. ¿Has oído que hay una humana cerca de la puerta de la Ópera Anatómica, jadeando y suplicando al Hemónculo que le ayude? No puede respirar con normalidad. Hasta cuando dice su nombre dice J-Jae H-Heyd-hari, como si se estuviera asfixiando».
languages.original_text: "Or you can reject my generous offer and look for help elsewhere. Have you heard about that humanling that's always hanging around the gate to the Anatomical Opera, gasping for breath, and begging the Haemonculus to save her? She can't breathe normally, even the way she says her name is funny — J-Jae H-Heyd-hari, as if she's about to suffocate."

traits.locale_text: «También puedes rechazar mi generosa oferta y buscar ayuda en otra parte. ¿Has oído que hay una humana cerca de la puerta de la Ópera Anatómica, jadeando y suplicando al Hemónculo que le ayude? No puede respirar con normalidad. Hasta cuando dice su nombre dice J-Jae H-Heyd-hari, como si se estuviera asfixiando».
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: 「もしくは、俺の寛大な申し出を拒否して、別の場所で助けを求めることもできるだろう。アナトミカル・オペラの門の周りをいつもうろついて、息を切らしながらハモンキュラスに救ってくれるように嘆願している人間の女を聞いたことがあるか？まともに呼吸もできず、自分の名前すら普通に言えない――“じ、ジェイ、ヘ…ヘイダリ…”と、まるで窒息しそうに言う」
languages.original_text: "Or you can reject my generous offer and look for help elsewhere. Have you heard about that humanling that's always hanging around the gate to the Anatomical Opera, gasping for breath, and begging the Haemonculus to save her? She can't breathe normally, even the way she says her name is funny — J-Jae H-Heyd-hari, as if she's about to suffocate."

traits.locale_text: 「もしくは、俺の寛大な申し出を拒否して、別の場所で助けを求めることもできるだろう。アナトミカル・オペラの門の周りをいつもうろついて、息を切らしながらハモンキュラスに救ってくれるように嘆願している人間の女を聞いたことがあるか？まともに呼吸もできず、自分の名前すら普通に言えない――“じ、ジェイ、ヘ…ヘイダリ…”と、まるで窒息しそうに言う」
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: "Oder Ihr könnt mein großzügiges Angebot ablehnen und anderswo Hilfe suchen. Habt Ihr von der Menschlingsfrau gehört, die immer am Tor der Anatomischen Oper herumlungert, um Atem ringend, und den Haemonculus anfleht, sie zu retten? Sie kann nicht mehr vernünftig atmen. Selbst ihren eigenen Namen spricht sie höchst amüsant aus: J-Jae H-Heyd-hari, als würde sie daran ersticken."
languages.original_text: "Or you can reject my generous offer and look for help elsewhere. Have you heard about that humanling that's always hanging around the gate to the Anatomical Opera, gasping for breath, and begging the Haemonculus to save her? She can't breathe normally, even the way she says her name is funny — J-Jae H-Heyd-hari, as if she's about to suffocate."

traits.locale_text: "Oder Ihr könnt mein großzügiges Angebot ablehnen und anderswo Hilfe suchen. Habt Ihr von der Menschlingsfrau gehört, die immer am Tor der Anatomischen Oper herumlungert, um Atem ringend, und den Haemonculus anfleht, sie zu retten? Sie kann nicht mehr vernünftig atmen. Selbst ihren eigenen Namen spricht sie höchst amüsant aus: J-Jae H-Heyd-hari, als würde sie daran ersticken."
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: « Mais vous êtes libre de refuser mon offre généreuse pour aller chercher de l'aide ailleurs. Vous avez entendu parler de cette humaine perpétuellement essoufflée qui passe ses journées près de la porte de l'Opéra anatomique en suppliant l'hémoncule de la sauver ? Elle a tellement de mal à respirer qu'elle n'arrive même pas à prononcer son nom correctement : "J-Jae H-Heyd-hari", comme si elle était sur le point de s'étouffer. »
languages.original_text: "Or you can reject my generous offer and look for help elsewhere. Have you heard about that humanling that's always hanging around the gate to the Anatomical Opera, gasping for breath, and begging the Haemonculus to save her? She can't breathe normally, even the way she says her name is funny — J-Jae H-Heyd-hari, as if she's about to suffocate."

traits.locale_text: « Mais vous êtes libre de refuser mon offre généreuse pour aller chercher de l'aide ailleurs. Vous avez entendu parler de cette humaine perpétuellement essoufflée qui passe ses journées près de la porte de l'Opéra anatomique en suppliant l'hémoncule de la sauver ? Elle a tellement de mal à respirer qu'elle n'arrive même pas à prononcer son nom correctement : "J-Jae H-Heyd-hari", comme si elle était sur le point de s'étouffer. »
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: "Dilersen bu cömert teklifimi reddedip başka kapıya gidebilirsin. Anatomi Operası'nın kapısından ayrılmayan insancığı tanıyor musun? Zar zor nefes alıyor, hani şu Haimonkulus'a yalvarıp duran yok mu? Doğru düzgün soluk alamıyor, adını söyleyişi bile gülünç. J... Jae H... Heyd... Dari... Boğulacak sanki."
languages.original_text: "Or you can reject my generous offer and look for help elsewhere. Have you heard about that humanling that's always hanging around the gate to the Anatomical Opera, gasping for breath, and begging the Haemonculus to save her? She can't breathe normally, even the way she says her name is funny — J-Jae H-Heyd-hari, as if she's about to suffocate."

traits.locale_text: "Ya da bu cömert teklifimi reddedip başka kapıya gidersin. Şu sürekli Anatomi Operası'nın kapısında takılan insancığı tanıyor musun? Zar zor nefes alıyor, hani şu Haimonkulus'a yalvarıp duran yok mu? Doğru düzgün soluk alamıyor yahu, adını söyleyişi bile gülünç. J... Jae H... Heyd... hari... Boğulacak sanki."
traits.speaker: Anger
